modName: Master Batch File ingots spells shouts bat perks bundle
summary: A batch(bat) file that gives you everything necessary in the game to be The ultimate warrior. Everything given is listed in the description.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, or whatever you may call it. Don\'t be too hard on me if you don\'t like it. (BTW I put many names into the title so then you could have a more vague search and  can be located much easier.)
{version 2.9}
1)changes all amounts to 99999
2) 99999 of the following
linen wraps
rolls of paper (for some mods that require this)
Grand soul gem (filled and empty)
Firewood
Netch leather
Chitin plate
Dragon bone and scales
{Version 2.7}
1)This version adds weapon speed multiplier to be set to 2 so your swing speed is much faster but still visible
2)sets your speedmult ( walking/sprinting speed) to 135
{Version 2.5}
Adds 999 Leather and leather strips
{Version 2.1}
Unfortunately there was another bug( My fault) D;, It was a gold bug instead of adding gold it removed gold. It has now been fixed. Sorry for the inconvenience once again.
Player.additem 0000000F (number of gold) <---- Adds Gold (has 7 \"0\"\'s)
Player.additem 000000F (Number of gold) <------- Removes Gold (Has 6 \"0\'\'s)
Take Note: DON\'T ENTER TOO MANY \"9\"\'S OR ELSE YOU WILL GET A NEGATIVE NUMBER AND YOU WIL HAVE A NEGATIVE NUMBER OF GOLD AND WILL NOT BE ABLE TO BUY ANYTHING UNLESS YOU FIX IT BY DOING THE SAME COMMAND.


{Version 2.0}
There was a bit of a problem when I tried entering Bat Masterbackup into the console, the console couldn\'t find it because before Masterbackup had a space between \"Master\" and \"backup\", buuuut, DON\'T FRET!!!! I have solved the issue and the batch file will work properly now.
Sorry for the inconvenience. Enjoy :D 
This is my first mod, or whatever you may call it. Don\'t be too hard on me if you don\'t like it. (BTW I put many names into the title so then you could have a more vague search and  can be located much easier.)

{Now with skills} Version 1.0
Now you have the ability to set all skills to 100 ( The legal way) which will make you a level 81


This is a personal file which I use myself so i said \" Hey, i\'m gonna upload this to Nexus for other people to enjoy\" so I did. This batch file contains the following:

all spells {NO DEVELOPER SPELLS}
All Vanilla smithing ingredients (99999)
all vanilla ingredients(99999 each)
All vanilla keys
All vanilla shouts and Bend Will
All perks
No shout recovery time
all ingots (999 each)
All map markers
9999999999 gold
[Mods your]
Carryweight
Health
Stamina
Magicka to 9999999
Faster weapon speed
Faster walking speed

[Requirements]
YOU MUST HAVE DRAGONBORN WITH LOAD ORDER 04
YOU MUST HAVE DAWNGUARD WITH LOAD ORDER 02
FOR THE FILE TO WORK PROPERLY

[\"Note\"]
This batch file contains Dragonborn and Dawnguard files, if you do not have any of them then don\'t worry, it will simply not be added.

Enjoy and have fun :D



{Cited Source/s}(Credits)
http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Forum:CC:Console_Command_Batch_Lists_(Skyrim)
author: Maykelhd1998
